objects.name: Active Directory Object Modification
objects.description:
Changes to AD objects (e.g., users, groups, OUs) are logged as Event ID 5136 (Object Modification) or 5163 (Attribute Changes). Examples:

- User Account: Modifying attributes (e.g., group membership, enabling/disabling accounts).
- Group Membership: Adding/removing members.
- OU: Changing properties/permissions (e.g., delegation).
- Service Account: Modifying SPNs or other attributes.
- Object Attributes: Changes to passwords, logon hours, or control flags.

x_mitre_log_sources.name: azure:signinlogs
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Add certificate credential, Update certificate credential

x_mitre_log_sources.name: m365:dirsync
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Replication cookie changes involving Configuration partition with new server/nTDSDSA objects.

x_mitre_log_sources.name: esxi:vpxd
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: permission change operations on datastores or VMs

x_mitre_log_sources.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_sources.channel: Add app role assignment grant to user: Consent to application by privileged or unexpected accounts
